Syncing repository: owner/repo
##[group]Getting Git version info

Successfully set up Git version: 2.43.0
##[endgroup]
##[group]Initializing the repository
/usr/bin/git init /home/runner/work/repo/repo

##[endgroup]
##[group]Fetching the repository
/usr/bin/git remote add origin https://github.com/owner/repo
/usr/bin/git fetch --depth=1 origin +refs/heads/main:refs/remotes/origin/main
From https://github.com/owner/repo
 * branch            main       -> FETCH_HEAD
 * [new branch]      main       -> origin/main
##[endgroup]
##[endgroup]

Successfully set up Python 3.11.7
##[endgroup]
